        public void notifyObservers​(java.lang.Object arg)
        Parameters:
        arg - is passed into the parameter for notifyObservers
        Since:

      • setChanged

        protected void setChanged​()
        Since:

        protected void clearChanged​()
        Since:

      • hasChanged

        public boolean hasChanged​()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the setChanged method has been called more recently than the clearChanged method
        Since:
        hasChanged method V.1

        Returns:
